title: What type of essay is the easiest to write? - Quora

response.answer_text: Anything that you can write! In my opinion, you should start writing one to explore the feature possibilities. At first, I used to avail assignment help online so that I can complete my essays but now I use the service so that I can focus on my study and future goals.

The voluntary kind, in a subject I like, with ample freedom to choose genre and writing style, right after I was struck by zing of inspiration and while I have ample time to do it and little else to do (or, alternatively, while I should be something else that I really don’t want to do).
